original_content:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This is a critical role that bridges the gap between business requirements and technical implementation, ensuring our systems accurately reflect and support complex business processes. As a key member of the team, you will leverage your strong analytical skills, technical proficiency, and collaborative approach to translate business needs into effective system configurations. Your work will have a direct impact on the efficiency and performance of our vehicle configuration systems, which are powered by cutting-edge machine learning and artificial intelligence technologies.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques, and communicate them clearly to the technical team
- Translate business requirements into detailed technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, and implementing and testing new configurations
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing querying, reporting, and data visualization tools
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex issues and devise effective solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in understanding and documenting business requirements using techniques such as user stories, use cases, and process flows
- Expertise in configuring and maintaining complex enterprise systems, with a deep understanding of data mapping, integrations, and testing methodologies

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, allowing you to effectively work with the technical aspects of the system
- Familiarity with machine learning and artificial intelligence concepts, enabling you to leverage these technologies to drive innovation and efficiency

Required Experience:
- Minimum 5 years of experience in a similar role, where you have successfully bridged the gap between business and technical teams
- Proven track record of delivering complex system configurations that align with and support evolving business needs
- Experience in the vehicle configuration industry or a related field, providing a strong understanding of the domain and its unique challenges

Preferred Experience:
- Knowledge of Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, collaborative environment
- Prior experience working with vehicle configuration systems, leveraging your domain expertise to drive continuous improvement

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration
- SQL and data querying tools
- Business process documentation and visualization tools
- Agile project management tools

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to drive project deliverables
- Willingness to engage in user acceptance testing and provide ongoing support for system configurations
- Adaptability to changing business requirements and the ability to pivot quickly

Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between our business stakeholders and the technical implementation of our vehicle configuration systems. As a highly skilled configuration specialist, you will be responsible for translating complex business requirements into effective, efficient, and user-friendly system configurations. Your work will have a direct impact on the performance and reliability of our mission-critical systems, which leverage cutting-edge machine learning and artificial intelligence technologies to drive innovation and competitive advantage.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage directly with cross-functional stakeholders, including business analysts, product managers, and subject matter experts, to deeply understand their needs and pain points
- Document business requirements using industry-standard techniques, such as user stories, use cases, and process flows, ensuring clear and concise communication of requirements
- Develop and maintain detailed technical configuration specifications, ensuring seamless integration between business needs and system capabilities
- Implement and test new configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including data mappings, integrations, and user interfaces
- Analyze existing system data to identify opportunities for improvement, utilizing querying, reporting, and visualization tools to uncover trends and inefficiencies
- Proactively recommend and implement configuration changes to streamline business processes and enhance system performance
- Collaborate with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing maintenance of system configurations
- Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate that configurations meet business requirements and function as expected
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support long-term system sustainability

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex issues and devise innovative solutions
- Strong technical proficiency in configuring and maintaining enterprise-level systems, with a deep understanding of data mapping, integrations, and testing methodologies
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, enabling you to effectively translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in documenting and communicating business requirements using industry-standard techniques, such as user stories, use cases, and process flows

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, allowing you to work closely with the technical team and understand the underlying system architecture
- Knowledge of machine learning and artificial intelligence concepts, enabling you to leverage these technologies to drive continuous improvement and innovation

Required Experience:
- Minimum 7 years of experience in a similar role, where you have successfully managed the configuration of complex enterprise systems
- Proven track record of delivering high-impact system configurations that align with and support evolving business needs
- Extensive experience in the vehicle configuration industry or a related field, providing deep domain expertise and understanding of the unique challenges and requirements

Preferred Experience:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, collaborative environment
- Prior experience working with vehicle configuration systems, leveraging your domain expertise to identify and implement process improvements

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration
- SQL and data querying tools
- Business process documentation and visualization tools
- Agile project management tools

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Highly collaborative, cross-functional team environment with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to drive project deliverables, while maintaining strong communication and stakeholder engagement
- Willingness to engage in user acceptance testing and provide ongoing support for system configurations
- Adaptability to changing business requirements and the ability to pivot quickly to address evolving needs

Role Overview:
As a configuration specialist for our cutting-edge vehicle configuration systems, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring that our technology solutions seamlessly align with and support the evolving needs of our business. Blending technical expertise with a deep understanding of business processes, you will be responsible for translating complex requirements into effective, efficient, and user-friendly system configurations. Your work will have a direct impact on the performance, reliability, and innovation of our mission-critical systems, which leverage advanced machine learning and artificial intelligence capabilities.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with cross-functional stakeholders, including business analysts, product managers, and subject matter experts, to deeply understand their needs, pain points, and desired outcomes
- Document business requirements using industry-standard techniques, such as user stories, use cases, and process flows, ensuring clear and concise communication of requirements to the technical team
- Develop and maintain detailed technical configuration specifications, ensuring seamless integration between business needs and system capabilities
- Implement and test new configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including data mappings, integrations, and user interfaces
- Analyze existing system data to identify opportunities for improvement, utilizing querying, reporting, and visualization tools to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and areas for optimization
- Proactively recommend and implement configuration changes to streamline business processes, enhance system performance, and drive continuous innovation
- Collaborate with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing maintenance of system configurations
- Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate that configurations meet business requirements and function as expected
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support long-term system sustainability and knowledge transfer

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex issues, identify root causes, and devise innovative solutions
- Strong technical proficiency in configuring and maintaining enterprise-level systems, with a deep understanding of data mapping, integrations, and testing methodologies
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, enabling you to effectively translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in documenting and communicating business requirements using industry-standard techniques, such as user stories, use cases, and process flows
- Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively in a cross-functional team environment, fostering effective partnerships and driving project deliverables

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, allowing you to work closely with the technical team and understand the underlying system architecture
- Knowledge of machine learning and artificial intelligence concepts, enabling you to leverage these technologies to drive continuous improvement and innovation
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, collaborative environment

Required Experience:
- Minimum 10 years of experience in a similar role, where you have successfully managed the configuration of complex enterprise systems
- Proven track record of delivering high-impact system configurations that align with and support evolving business needs
- Extensive experience in the vehicle configuration industry or a related field, providing deep domain expertise and understanding of the unique challenges and requirements

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience working with vehicle configuration systems, leveraging your domain expertise to identify and implement process improvements and drive innovation
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, collaborative environment

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration
- SQL and data querying tools
- Business process documentation and visualization tools
- Agile project management tools

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Highly collaborative, cross-functional team environment with a focus on continuous improvement, innovation, and delivering exceptional business outcomes
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to drive project deliverables, while maintaining strong communication and stakeholder engagement
- Willingness to engage in user acceptance testing and provide ongoing support for system configurations
- Adaptability to changing business requirements and the ability to pivot quickly to address evolving needs, leveraging your technical expertise and business acumen to drive solutions
